original_text: Immediately, Zechariah could speak again. He could speak easily. He began to thank God aloud. 1: Everything had happened as the angel had said. Immediately, Zechariah could speak again. He could speak easily. He began to thank God aloud.
korean_text: 이에 그 입이 곧 열리고 혀가 풀리며 말을 하여 하나님을 찬송하니

sentences.korean_translation: 즉시, 사가랴는 다시 말할 수 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He began to thank God aloud.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님께 큰 소리로 감사하기 시작했습니다.

sentences.original_text: 1: Everything had happened as the angel had said.
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 것은 천사가 말한 대로 일어났습니다.
즉시, 사가랴는 다시 말할 수 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He began to thank God aloud.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님께 큰 소리로 감사하기 시작했습니다.
